summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.8°C) and outside temperature (down 1.9°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 3404 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 11010 lux), cloud levels (up 1571 m), feels like temperature (up 4.7°C), and outside temperature (up 4.0°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
>>>Today’s average cloud levels is 99.9m lower than yesterday, 954.3m lower than past week, 1570.5m lower than past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 765m to 2220m and averaged 1165.7m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Possible light showers, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
